module.name: specification_based_configuration
module.keywords: module, use case, configuration, variant configuration
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of use or design cases of product or process data in a family of products offered to market, these use or design cases being defined with Boolean combinations of product characteristics.

inscope.li: characterization of a use case of product or process data with a Boolean combinations of product characteristics;
characterization of a design case of product or process data with a Boolean combinations of product characteristics;
assignment of date-based effectivity to a use case;
assignment of a use case to a part occurrence.
